rules_text:
Counters remain on Jared as it moves to any zone other than a player's hand or library.
{2}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. If that card had flying, first strike, deathtouch, haste, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, or vigilance, put a counter of that kind on Jared. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on Jared.
